17  package com.okta.sdk.impl.ds.cache;
18  
19  import com.okta.sdk.cache.Cache;
20  import com.okta.sdk.cache.CacheManager;
21  import com.okta.sdk.impl.ds.CacheRegionNameResolver;
22  import com.okta.sdk.lang.Assert;
23  
24  import java.util.Map;
25  
26  public class DefaultCacheResolver implements CacheResolver {
27  
28      private final CacheManager cacheManager;
29      private final CacheRegionNameResolver cacheRegionNameResolver;
30  
31      public DefaultCacheResolver(CacheManager cacheManager, CacheRegionNameResolver cacheRegionNameResolver) {
32          Assert.notNull(cacheManager, "cacheManager cannot be null.");
33          Assert.notNull(cacheRegionNameResolver, "cacheRegionNameResolver cannot be null.");
34          this.cacheManager = cacheManager;
35          this.cacheRegionNameResolver = cacheRegionNameResolver;
36      }
37  
38      public Cache<String, Map<String, ?>> getCache(Class clazz) {
39          Assert.notNull(clazz, "Class argument cannot be null.");
40          String cacheRegionName = this.cacheRegionNameResolver.getCacheRegionName(clazz);
41          return this.cacheManager.getCache(cacheRegionName);
42      }
43  }
